c74object.name: pdm.queue.frommtx

method.name: list
method.digest: Write a value to the specified channel(s)
method.description: A three-item list containin the channel to write to, the value to write, and 1 will output the queue index (1-based) and the value, suitable for the "write" message to pdm.queue.

c74object.description: Simple abstraction that allows you to use a matrixctrl as a basic grid controller for writing values into queues.
c74object.digest: Use a matrixctrl to write to a queue.
